info.name: Minecraft Themed Creeper Cursor
info.description:
I make lots of thingys. This be one of them. Has cursors for links, too!
Works anywhere in the Intertubez.

Minecraft belongs to Mojang.
Creepers belong to Minecraft, and frankly, they can stay there.
Copyright stuff, blah blah, I own nothing.
